PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-07822019-06-13,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectInterim Order No. 2 Respecting Battery-powered Hand-held Lasers
PrecisOrder approving INTERIM ORDER NO. 2 RESPECTING BATTERY-POWERED HAND-HELD LASERS, made by the Minister of Transport, in order to address the continued risk to aviation safety caused by laser attacks on aircraft by prohibiting possession of hand-held lasers with an output greater than 1 mW within the immediate vicinity of certified aerodromes and heliports where the majority of laser attacks occur.
AttachmentsAttachment
